parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain in which you want to get the data lineage node.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the data lineage node that you want to get. Both, a lineage node identifier generated by Amazon DataZone and a sourceIdentifier of the lineage node are supported. If sourceIdentifier is greater than 1800 characters, you can use lineage node identifier generated by Amazon DataZone to get the node details.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the data lineage node was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain where you're getting the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: downstreamNodes
nested_items.description: The downsteam nodes of the specified data lineage node.

nested_items.name: eventTimestamp
nested_items.description: The event timestamp of the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: eventTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the event described in the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: formsOutput
nested_items.description: The metadata of the specified data lineage node.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: formName
nested_items.description: The name of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The name of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: sourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: The source identifier of the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The name of the type of the specified data lineage node.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The revision type of the specified data lineage node.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the data lineage node was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user who updated the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: upstreamNodes
nested_items.description: The upstream nodes of the specified data lineage node.

nested_items.name: eventTimestamp
nested_items.description: The event timestamp of the data lineage node.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the data lineage node.
